name: Twitch Paints
description:
Twitch Paints is a pixel art canvas powered by your chat! It's fun and colourful and makes the perfect 'be right back' screen. Let your community show their creative flair with easy to use commands to paint pixels directly from your Twitch chat. 

It's super easy to set up and you can have it on your stream in minutes. All the instructions are displayed on the screen and the streamer can blank any pixels for safety.

There are 10 fresh colours to choose from and an easy grid-based pixel art canvas. There is also a handy preview and list of the ten most recent artists!

Twitch Paints is in active development and there's more to come in free updates to all our streamers.
